ingredients.content: 1 can tuna, in oil (approx. 12 oz), drained

preparations.content: Place parsley into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place lemon juice, tuna, anchovy, olive oil, garlic and mascarpone into mixing bowl and mix <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>.

Add olives, capers, reserved chopped parsley, salt and pepper, and chop <b>Turbo/1 sec/2 times<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Chop a further <b>Turbo/1 sec/1 time<b>. Transfer to a bowl and serve or refrigerate until needed.
